modName: The Aspen Shack - An open world player house
summary: This house is located in open world which is awesome change for me. [Upload screenshots :) The best screenshot will get featured] It features openable/closable windows, a watch tower, basement in mountains (With crafting stations and additional storage) and awesome scenic view.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]The Aspen shack
[/size]                                                [quote]An open world house[/quote][b] Features:
[/b]-Working windows that can be opened/closed
-Safe storage
-Crafting stations
-Scenic view 

[b]Recommended:
[/b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52612/? - Real shelter
 
 -When it's raining, there will be no rain visible when inside the shack, only from
  windows. (It currently isn't supporting my house now, but i will release
  patch as soon as i get permissions)

[b]Installation:[/b]
Please, use NMM for installation, if you wan't to install manulay:

1. UnZip content
2. Extract "TheAspenShack.esp" to your Skyrim Data directory
     -That is C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\Data
       unless you pirated it.
3. In Skyrim Launcher tick TheAspenShack.esp if not ticked by default

[b]Known issues:
[/b]-Nothing for now

[b]FaQ:
[/b]
1. Q: How can i acces the house ? It's locked !
    A: There is a Box with shovel next to the campfire, it contains Key

2. Q: Is it supposed to be that dark in basement ?
    A: Yes, it is. No i won't add more light sources. (It might also be
        affected by various lighting overhauls)

3. Q: Can i upload it to my website ?
    A: Please, read the permission tab.
